revision.text: * navigation

{{{quote|}}}
{{#if: {{{cite|}}}|
— {{{cite|}}}
}}
Coder Merlin™

== Purpose == Mimics console input / output. == Implementation approach == The template is targeted to merge functionality of [[Template:ConsoleLine]] and [[Template:ConsoleLines]]. The template allows the injection of [[Help:Bootstrap classes|bootstrap classes]], primarily to add rounded corners and some padding to the single template instance or to the first and last instances of the template call series. Editors are encouraged to replace / edit all instances of both templates eventually using the proposed syntax / parameters. == Usage == The first unnamed parameter contains the console input/output and it is the only mandatory parameter. There are the optional named parameters: 
prompt   # The console prompt.
classes  # Names of CSS classes which apply to the block.
;Example 
{{ConsoleLines
|classes=rounded py-2
|prompt=john-williams@codermerlin:~$
|sudo systemctl status apache2
[sudo] password for john-williams:           
Unit apache2.service could not be found.
}}
;Result {{ConsoleLines |classes=rounded py-2 |prompt=john-williams@codermerlin:~$ |sudo systemctl status apache2 [sudo] password for john-williams: Unit apache2.service could not be found. }} {{hint|class=mt-4| # Use one template for a single command prompt. # Use rounded py-2 classes to add border radius and some vertical padding. # Do not use
to insert a line break, just start typing on the new line. # Use a number of subsequent instances of the template to build a block of console lines with multiple command prompts. In this case you might want: #* to add rounded corners only to the top of the first instance and to the bottom of the last instance #* not to use padding between console lines blocks. # Play with rounded-top, rounded-bottom, pt-2, pb-2 to achieve the desired layout. # In complex cases when the console output fails to appear correctly (for example, when it contains the reserved characrters like =), wrap it into tag. }} ;Example 
{{ConsoleLines
|classes=rounded-top pt-2 
|prompt=john-williams@codermerlin:~$
|sudo systemctl status apache2
[sudo] password for john-williams:           
Unit apache2.service could not be found.
}}
{{ConsoleLines
|classes= 
|prompt=john-williams@codermerlin:~$
|ping 8.8.8.8
PING 8.8.8.8 (8.8.8.8) 56(84) bytes of data.
64 bytes from 8.8.8.8: icmp_seq=1 ttl=116 time=19.5 ms
64 bytes from 8.8.8.8: icmp_seq=2 ttl=116 time=19.7 ms
64 bytes from 8.8.8.8: icmp_seq=3 ttl=116 time=19.7 ms
64 bytes from 8.8.8.8: icmp_seq=4 ttl=116 time=19.5 ms
^C
--- 8.8.8.8 ping statistics ---
4 packets transmitted, 4 received, 0% packet loss, time 3004ms
rtt min/avg/max/mdev = 19.453/19.573/19.671/0.091 ms
}}
{{ConsoleLines
|classes=rounded-bottom pb-2 
|prompt=john-williams@codermerlin:~$
|sudo systemctl status apache2
[sudo] password for john-williams:           
Unit apache2.service could not be found.
}}
;Result {{ConsoleLines |classes=rounded-top pt-2 |prompt=john-williams@codermerlin:~$ |sudo systemctl status apache2 [sudo] password for john-williams: Unit apache2.service could not be found. }} {{ConsoleLines |classes= |prompt=john-williams@codermerlin:~$ |ping 8.8.8.8 PING 8.8.8.8 (8.8.8.8) 56(84) bytes of data. 64 bytes from 8.8.8.8: icmp_seq=1 ttl=116 time=19.5 ms 64 bytes from 8.8.8.8: icmp_seq=2 ttl=116 time=19.7 ms 64 bytes from 8.8.8.8: icmp_seq=3 ttl=116 time=19.7 ms 64 bytes from 8.8.8.8: icmp_seq=4 ttl=116 time=19.5 ms ^C --- 8.8.8.8 ping statistics --- 4 packets transmitted, 4 received, 0% packet loss, time 3004ms rtt min/avg/max/mdev = 19.453/19.573/19.671/0.091 ms }} {{ConsoleLines |classes=rounded-bottom pb-2 |prompt=john-williams@codermerlin:~$ |sudo systemctl status apache2 [sudo] password for john-williams: Unit apache2.service could not be found. }} == Variations == There are two additional colour flavours of this template: * [[Template:ConsoleLinesLight]] and * [[Template:ConsoleLinesDark]] ; Light {{ConsoleLinesLight |classes=rounded py-2 |prompt=john-williams@codermerlin:~$ |sudo systemctl status apache2 [sudo] password for john-williams: Unit apache2.service could not be found. }} ; Dark {{ConsoleLinesDark |classes=rounded py-2 |prompt=john-williams@codermerlin:~$ |sudo systemctl status apache2 [sudo] password for john-williams: Unit apache2.service could not be found. }}
{{#tag:poem|{{#if: {{{prompt|}}}|{{{prompt|}}} }}{{{1|}}}|compact}}
{{{1}}} {{{2}}}

[[File:Hint.png|class=m-auto d-none d-md-inline-block|link=|150px]]Helpful Hint
{{{1|}}}

{{{1}}}
The first unnamed parameter provides the key sequence / any other content. ;Named parameters 
classes   # Names of additional CSS classes
;Example 
{{KeySequence
|{{SpecialKey|M|x}} lsp-workspace-folders-remove {{Key|RETURN}} {{Key|RETURN}} 
|classes=rounded py-2 bg-light text-dark mb-3
}}
;Result {{KeySequence |{{SpecialKey|M|x}} lsp-workspace-folders-remove {{Key|RETURN}} {{Key|RETURN}} |classes=rounded py-2 bg-light text-dark mb-3 }} ;Example 
{{KeySequence
|{{SpecialKey|M|x}} lsp-workspace-folders-remove {{Key|RETURN}} {{Key|RETURN}} 
|classes=rounded py-2 bg-warning mb-3
}}
;Result {{KeySequence |{{SpecialKey|M|x}} lsp-workspace-folders-remove {{Key|RETURN}} {{Key|RETURN}} |classes=rounded py-2 bg-warning mb-3 }}

Key Concepts[[File:KeyConceptsIcon.png|class=m-auto d-none d-md-inline-block|link=]]
{{{1|}}}
{{Sitenotice| |dark|fa-2x}}

{{#set:Sequenced subpages={{{Pages|}}}}} {{#arraydefine: slides |{{{Pages|}}} |; }} {{#arrayprint: slides | |@ |{{#subobject:@ |Course page={{FULLPAGENAME}}/@ |Course page number={{#expr:0{{#arraysearch:slides|@}}+1}} }} }}
{{#arrayprint: slides | |@@@@ | * [[{{PAGENAME}}/@@@@|@@@@]] }}
[[{{FULLPAGENAME}}/{{#arrayindex: slides|0}}|{{{1|Start}}}]] {{#if: {{#ask: [[{{FULLPAGENAME}}/All]][[Modification date::+]] }} |[[{{FULLPAGENAME}}/All|One page]] |[{{fullurl:{{FULLPAGENAME}}/All|action=edit&preload=Template:MerlinMultipageExperienceAllPreload}} One page] }}
__NOTOC__ {{#arrayreset: slides}} Converts a page into a cover page of an education course. ;Usage 
{{MerlinMultipageExperienceSubpages
|Pages = # the ordered list of subpages delimited by a semicolon
|        # the first unnamed parameter is used as the start button label (default = Start)
}}
;Example 
{{MerlinMultipageExperienceSubpages
|Pages=Sample Course/Student Welcome;
Merlin History;
Merlin Video;
Merlin
|Start training
}}
; Related stuff :Properties :* [[Property:Course page]] :* [[Property:Course page number]] :Templates :* [[Template:MerlinMultipageExperienceAll]] :* [[Template:MerlinMultipageExperienceAllPreload]] :* [[Template:MerlinMultipageExperienceNavBar]]

Exercises[[File:ExercisesIcon.png|class=m-auto d-none d-md-inline-block|link=]]
{{{1|}}}

<choose uncached> <option>{{bquote|quote=Imagination is more important than knowledge.|cite=Albert Einstein|class=mt-3}}</option> <option>{{bquote|quote=The only kind of learning which significantly influences behavior is self-discovered or self-appropriated learning - truth that has been assimilated in experience.|cite=Carl Rogers|class=mt-3}}</option> <option>{{bquote|quote=The greatest enemy of knowledge is not ignorance, it is the illusion of knowledge.|cite=Stephen Hawking|class=mt-3}}</option> <option>{{bquote|quote=Doubt is an uncomfortable condition, but certainty is absurd.|cite=Voltaire|class=mt-3}}</option> <option>{{bquote|quote=Students should be made to think, to doubt, to communicate, to question, to learn from their mistakes, and most importantly have fun in their learning.|cite=Professor Richard Feynman|class=mt-3}}</option> <option>{{bquote|quote=The best teachers are not the ones who provide you all the answers. They're the ones who get deeply excited by the questions they cannot answer, the ones who teach how to question and doubt the things you learn.|cite=Professor Richard Feynman|class=mt-3}}</option> <option>{{bquote|quote=We do not learn from experience...we learn from reflecting on experience.|cite=John Dewey|class=mt-3}}</option> </choose>

{{card |footer={{{1|This is a site notice }}} |fclasses=alert alert-{{{2|primary}}} font-weight-bold mb-0 justify-content-center flex-column flex-md-row rounded |classes=w-100 p-1 sitenotice-alert plainlinks border-0 {{{3|}}} }} ;Code 
{{Sitenotice
|             # Your message goes here ...
|             # Bootstrap coloring classes names [ info, secondary, warning, success, etc ]
}}
;Example 
{{Sitenotice}}
;Result {{Sitenotice}} ;Example 
{{Sitenotice|The wiki is under maintenance. Keep quiet.|info|fa-2x}}
;Result {{Sitenotice|The wiki is under maintenance. Keep quiet.|info|fa-2x}} ;Example 
{{Sitenotice|Please note that all contributions to {{SITENAME}} may be edited, altered, or removed by other contributors.|warning}}
;Result {{Sitenotice|Please note that all contributions to {{SITENAME}} may be edited, altered, or removed by other contributors.|warning}}
